greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Pascal's tetrahedron: entries in 3-dimensional version of Pascal triangle, or trinomial coefficients.
comment: Greatest numbers in each 2D triangle form A022916 (multinomial coefficient n!/([n/3]![(n+1)/3]![(n+2)/3]!).) 2D triangle sums are powers of 3. - _Gerald McGarvey_, Aug 15 2004
T(n,j,k) is the number of lattice paths from (0,0,0) to (n,j,k) with steps (1,0,0), (1,1,0) and (1,1,1). - _Dimitri Boscainos_, Aug 16 2015
reference: Marco Costantini: Metodo per elevare qualsiasi trinomio a qualsiasi potenza. Archimede, rivista per gli insegnanti e i cultori di matematiche pure e applicate, anno XXXVIII ottobre-dicembre 1986, pp. 205-209. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 19 2009]
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10659
Index entries for sequences related to 3D arrays of numbers
formula: Coefficients of x, y, z in (x+y+z)^n: Let T'(n; i,j,k) := T(n, j,k) where i = n-(j+k). Then T'(n+1; i,j,k) = T'(n; i-1,j,k)+T'(n; i,j-1,k)+T'(n; i,j,k-1), T'(n; i,j,-1) := 0, T'(n; i,j,k) is invariant under permutations of (i,j,k); T'(0, 0, 0)=1.
T'(n;i,j,k) = n!/(i!*j!*k!) and (x+y+z)^n = Sum_{i+j+k=n; 0 <= i,j,k <= n}T'(n; i,j,k)*x^i*y^j*z^k . Hence Sum_{i+j+k=n; 0 <= i,j,k <= n}T'(n; i,j,k} = 3^n. - _Gregory Gerard Wojnar_, Oct 08 2020
example: The first few slices of the tetrahedron (or pyramid) are:
... 1 .... Here is the third slice of the pyramid
maple: p:= proc(i, j, k) option remember;
if k<0 or i<0 or i>k or j<0 or j>i then 0
mathematica: p[i_, j_, k_] := p[i, j, k] = Which[ k<0 || i<0 || i>k || j<0 || j>i, 0, {i, j, k} == {0, 0, 0}, 1, True, p[i, j, k-1] + p[i-1, j, k-1] + p[i-1, j-1, k-1]]; Table[p[i, j, k], {k, 0, 6}, {i, 0, k}, {j, 0, i}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 31 2012, translated from _Alois P. Heinz_'s Maple program *)
program: (p:ps) * qs'@(q:qs) = p * q : ps * qs' + [p] * qs
xref: Entry [3, 2] in each slice gives A002378, entry [4, 3] in each slice gives A027480, entry [5, 2] in each slice gives A033488, entry [5, 3] in each slice gives A033487.
See A268240 for this read mod 2.
results.author: _Lior Manor_
